publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1999 Fiona Hyslop: The Charity Test (Specified Bodies) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the Charity Test (Specified Bodies) (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram*, Maureen Watt*
